thread.section_title: Bundle Stars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bundle Stars | www.bundlestars.com
thread.title: Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text:
There's not much to say about Bundle Stars. Their pricing is fair, their policies decent, and their service excellent. I've reccomended them to lots of friends (most of their bundles are awesome) and they've thanked me for that, because it IS a good website for games and bundles.
Quality speaks for itself, and finding myself coming back over and over for years now, just proves this shop is worth the effort. At least for me.
